RegularExpressionBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilterWithRegularExpression, SubstituteRegularExpression
public abstract class RegularExpressionBase extends CopyFilesNamingOne
A base class for CopyFilesNaming classes that use a regular-expression.
Author:
Owen Feehan
